name: Shiggys Takoyaki
description:
In this arcade action game, you have to put together four ingredients of the Japanese specialty "Takoyaki": Ginger, Leek, Japanese Dough, and – of course – Octopus. Drag and Drop ingredients from the treadmill onto prepared dough patties on the grill.

Concept/Artwork: Andreas Felix Tritsch
Music: Djamel Berkaoui (SatyreX)
Code: Jörg Burbach
